enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.help: Will disable if an error occurs; otherwise set to disable to disable plugin

program_thumbnail.label: Program Thumbnail
program_thumbnail.help: M3U8 only used with subscriptions.  TVHeadend has bugs with the M3U8 file from PlutoTV. ffmpeg uses ffmpeg and ffprobe.  Internal is the most efficient and cleanest solution.

channel-thumbnail.label: Channel Thumbnail
channel-thumbnail.help: M3U8 only used with subscriptions.  TVHeadend has bugs with the M3U8 file from PlutoTV. ffmpeg uses ffmpeg and ffprobe.  Internal is the most efficient and cleanest solution.

channel-update_timeout.label: Channel Update Timeout
channel-update_timeout.help: Default pulls channel data from PlutoTV in hours

channel-import_groups.label: Import Channel Groups
channel-import_groups.help: Imports groups from PlutoTV into the group other column

player-tuner_count.label: tuner_count
player-tuner_count.help: Number of streams active at one time

player-stream_type.label: stream_type
player-stream_type.help: M3U8 only used with subscriptions.  TVHeadend has bugs with the M3U8 file from PlutoTV. ffmpeg uses ffmpeg and ffprobe.  Internal is the most efficient and cleanest solution.

player-enable_url_filter.label: Enable URL Filtering
player-enable_url_filter.help: Filters out streams from URL addresses based on regular expression

player-enable_pts_filter.label: Enable PTS Filtering
player-enable_pts_filter.help: Filters out corrupted PTS packets.  Requires ffprobe.exe

epg-hours.label: EPG Hours to Pull
epg-hours.help: PlutoTV max is 14 hours including 2 hours in the past.

epg-min_refresh_rate.label: EPG Min Refresh Rate
epg-min_refresh_rate.help: Default=3600 seconds (1 hours). When a HTTP request for epg data is received, will refresh the data if older than this value.
